description:
Survive family vacation, save the world.

He's a spy. She's an assassin. Together, Loid and Yor keep their double lives to themselves while pretending to be the perfect family. However, their adopted daughter Anya, a telepath, knows both of their exciting secrets unbeknownst to them. While under the guise of taking his family on a weekend winter getaway, Loid's attempt to make progress on his current mission Operation Strix proves difficult when Anya mistakenly gets involved and triggers events that threaten world peace!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
synonyms: 劇場版 スパイファミリー

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Espionage
tags.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Fake Relationship
tags.description: When two characters enter a fake relationship that mutually benefits one or both involved.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Aviation
tags.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Trains
tags.description: Prominently features trains.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Cyborg
tags.description: Prominently features a human character whose physiological functions are aided or enhanced by artificial means.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

node.description:
He was previously an assistant to [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Kazue Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/103052/Kazue-Katou)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_tatsuyaendo_)

He was previously an assistant to [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Kazue Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/103052/Kazue-Katou)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_tatsuyaendo_)

He was previously an assistant to [Tatsuki Fujimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119917/Tatsuki-Fujimoto) and [Kazue Katou](https://anilist.co/staff/103052/Kazue-Katou)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_tatsuyaendo_)
He formerly worked at [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/) and is currently working at [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichirou_o)

Waseda University graduate. Best known as the co-creator of [Code Geass](https://anilist.co/anime/1575/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asanovic7) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/asanovic7/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/asanovic7/)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/). One of the founding members of [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858/).

Married to [Reiko Sakai](https://anilist.co/staff/148052/).
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.

[Website](http://knowname.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/4274802379)

A musical creative unit that handles a wide range of music for animation productions.

**Members:**
\- [NIKIIE](https://anilist.co/staff/150707) - vocalist
\- [Ayaka Tachibana](https://anilist.co/staff/150710/) - vocalist
\- [AIJ](https://anilist.co/staff/150708/) - vocalist
\- [R・O・N](https://anilist.co/staff/106037/) - music creator
\- [Makoto Miyazaki](https://anilist.co/staff/109497/) - music creator
\- [Shuuhei Mutsuki](https://anilist.co/staff/120035/) - music creator
\- [Kohei by SIMONSAYZ](https://anilist.co/staff/150793/) - music creator
\- [eNu](https://anilist.co/staff/150711) - music creator
\- [Genki Mizuno](https://anilist.co/staff/150709/) - music creator
\- [so-bin](https://anilist.co/staff/119090) - illustrator
She is currently working at MADBOX.
